title: rclone 1.43 on raspberry pi with hubic
body:
Hi,
I think that rclone 1.43 arm is a broken with hubic... I try to upload a simple text file and this is what I get :
```
2018/09/04 11:43:38 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.43" starting with parameters ["rclone" "copy" "-vvv" "/vc/test.txt" "hubic:pi"]
2018/09/04 11:43:38 DEBUG : Using config file from "/root/.config/rclone/rclone.conf"
2018/09/04 11:43:39 DEBUG : Hubic: Got swift credentials (expiry 2018-09-05 00:12:59 +0200 CEST in 12h29m19.276348683s)
2018/09/04 11:43:42 DEBUG : test.txt: Couldn't find file - need to transfer
2018/09/04 11:43:43 DEBUG : test.txt: Uploading segment file "test.txt/1536054223.089489649/25/00000000" into "pi_segments"
2018/09/04 11:43:50 DEBUG : test.txt: Uploading segment file "test.txt/1536054223.089489649/25/00000001" into "pi_segments"
2018/09/04 11:43:51 DEBUG : test.txt: Uploading segment file "test.txt/1536054223.089489649/25/00000002" into "pi_segments"
2018/09/04 11:43:53 DEBUG : test.txt: Uploading segment file "test.txt/1536054223.089489649/25/00000003" into "pi_segments"
2018/09/04 11:44:15 DEBUG : test.txt: Uploading segment file "test.txt/1536054223.089489649/25/00000004" into "pi_segments"
2018/09/04 11:44:29 DEBUG : test.txt: Uploading segment file "test.txt/1536054223.089489649/25/00000005" into "pi_segments"
2018/09/04 11:44:29 DEBUG : test.txt: Uploading segment file "test.txt/1536054223.089489649/25/00000006" into "pi_segments"
2018/09/04 11:44:39 INFO  :
Transferred:            25 / 25 Bytes, 100%, 0 Bytes/s, ETA 0s
Errors:                 0
Checks:                 0 / 0, -
Transferred:            0 / 1, 0%
Elapsed time:      1m1.7s
Transferring:
 *                                      test.txt: 100% /25, 0/s, 0s

2018/09/04 11:44:45 DEBUG : test.txt: Uploading segment file "test.txt/1536054223.089489649/25/00000007" into "pi_segments"
2018/09/04 11:45:05 DEBUG : test.txt: Uploading segment file "test.txt/1536054223.089489649/25/00000008" into "pi_segments"
2018/09/04 11:45:07 DEBUG : test.txt: Uploading segment file "test.txt/1536054223.089489649/25/00000009" into "pi_segments"
2018/09/04 11:45:28 ERROR : test.txt: Failed to copy: HTTP Error: 503: 503 Service Unavailable
2018/09/04 11:45:28 ERROR : Attempt 1/3 failed with 1 errors and: HTTP Error: 503: 503 Service Unavailable
2018/09/04 11:45:31 DEBUG : test.txt: Couldn't find file - need to transfer
2018/09/04 11:45:31 DEBUG : test.txt: Uploading segment file "test.txt/1536054331.221568584/25/00000000" into "pi_segments"
2018/09/04 11:45:32 DEBUG : test.txt: Uploading segment file "test.txt/1536054331.221568584/25/00000001" into "pi_segments"
2018/09/04 11:45:35 DEBUG : test.txt: Uploading segment file "test.txt/1536054331.221568584/25/00000002" into "pi_segments"
2018/09/04 11:45:39 INFO  :
Transferred:            50 / 50 Bytes, 100%, 0 Bytes/s, ETA 0s
Errors:                 0
Checks:                 0 / 0, -
Transferred:            0 / 1, 0%
Elapsed time:      2m1.7s
Transferring:
 *                                      test.txt: 100% /25, 3/s, 0s

2018/09/04 11:45:57 DEBUG : test.txt: Uploading segment file "test.txt/1536054331.221568584/25/00000003" into "pi_segments"
2018/09/04 11:46:00 DEBUG : test.txt: Uploading segment file "test.txt/1536054331.221568584/25/00000004" into "pi_segments"
2018/09/04 11:46:03 DEBUG : test.txt: Uploading segment file "test.txt/1536054331.221568584/25/00000005" into "pi_segments"
2018/09/04 11:46:04 DEBUG : test.txt: Uploading segment file "test.txt/1536054331.221568584/25/00000006" into "pi_segments"
2018/09/04 11:46:28 DEBUG : test.txt: Uploading segment file "test.txt/1536054331.221568584/25/00000007" into "pi_segments"
2018/09/04 11:46:32 DEBUG : test.txt: Uploading segment file "test.txt/1536054331.221568584/25/00000008" into "pi_segments"
2018/09/04 11:46:35 DEBUG : test.txt: Uploading segment file "test.txt/1536054331.221568584/25/00000009" into "pi_segments"
2018/09/04 11:46:37 DEBUG : test.txt: Uploading segment file "test.txt/1536054331.221568584/25/00000010" into "pi_segments"
2018/09/04 11:46:39 INFO  :
Transferred:            50 / 50 Bytes, 100%, 0 Bytes/s, ETA 0s
Errors:                 0
Checks:                 0 / 0, -
Transferred:            0 / 1, 0%
Elapsed time:      3m1.7s
Transferring:
 *                                      test.txt: 100% /25, 0/s, 0s

2018/09/04 11:46:41 DEBUG : test.txt: Uploading segment file "test.txt/1536054331.221568584/25/00000011" into "pi_segments"
2018/09/04 11:46:44 DEBUG : test.txt: Uploading segment file "test.txt/1536054331.221568584/25/00000012" into "pi_segments"
2018/09/04 11:46:45 ERROR : test.txt: Failed to copy: HTTP Error: 503: 503 Service Unavailable
2018/09/04 11:46:45 ERROR : Attempt 2/3 failed with 1 errors and: HTTP Error: 503: 503 Service Unavailable
2018/09/04 11:46:45 DEBUG : test.txt: Couldn't find file - need to transfer
[...]
```

With 1.42 everything works fine. This is the log with 1.42 : 
```
2018/09/04 11:50:21 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.42" starting with parameters ["rclone" "copy" "-vvv" "/vc/test.txt" "hubic:pi"]
2018/09/04 11:50:21 DEBUG : Using config file from "/root/.config/rclone/rclone.conf"
2018/09/04 11:50:23 DEBUG : Hubic: Got swift credentials (expiry 2018-09-05 00:12:59 +0200 CEST in 12h22m35.509902533s)
2018/09/04 11:50:26 DEBUG : test.txt: Couldn't find file - need to transfer
2018/09/04 11:50:30 INFO  : test.txt: Copied (new)
2018/09/04 11:50:30 INFO  :
Transferred:     25 Bytes (2 Bytes/s)
Errors:                 0
Checks:                 0
Transferred:            1
Elapsed time:        8.4s

2018/09/04 11:50:30 DEBUG : 6 go routines active
2018/09/04 11:50:30 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.42" finishing with parameters ["rclone" "copy" "-vvv" "/vc/test.txt" "hubic:pi"]
```
